flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=36>>36 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-36 = <<59-36=23>>23 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 23 seashells which is 23*(1/4) = <<23*(1/4)=23/4>>23/4 seashells
They are now left with 59-23/4 = <<59-23/4=213/4>>213/4 seashells
#### 213/4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
